title: the Scarlet Flame
intro: Prodigy of the Flameheart House, one of the five noble houses of Everlight, Eris is famous for weaving her fire flag and dancing through the battlefield, hence, earning her the nickname of the Scarlet Flame. Since birth, she was assigned to be the personal guard of the youngest daughter of the Everlight's Paragon, Ciarra Crownsworth. They grew up together and became best friends. Eris later on joined Ciarra and the others to create the Seventh Order of Everlight, where she continued to shine through her talent and became one of the strongest flame masters in the world.

abilities.name: Unwavering Faith
abilities.details: While out of combat, Eris gains [bf]increased movement speed[/]. Upon entering combat with an enemy hero (by dealing or taking damage from them), Eris's next basic attack within a few seconds deals bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and briefly grants her a burst of [bf]tenacity[/].

abilities.name: Flaming Sweep
abilities.details:
Eris's next three basic attacks sweeps her fire banner in a wide arc, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies around her.

If Eris is within her active Fiery Rally[/] banner's radius, her enhanced basic attacks will deal additional [ap]magical damage[/] based on the target's [hp]current health[/].

abilities.name: Fiery Rally
abilities.details:
Eris plants down her Sacred Banner[/], dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all nearby enemies. The planted banner radiates an aura, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) per second for a few seconds.

All allied heroes standing within its radius (including Eris) will be granted bonus [bf]physical and magical power[/].

abilities.name: Zealous Charge
abilities.details:
Eris dashes a short distance in a target direction. If Eris lands within the radius of her active Fiery Rally[/] banner, the banner emits a pulse, dealing bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to nearby enemies while also granting her and all allied heroes a shield (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) for a few seconds.

The shield can only be granted once per Fiery Rally[/] banner duration. In addition, casting Fiery Rally[/] resets the cooldowns of Zealous Charge[/].

abilities.name: Holy Conflagration
abilities.details:
Eris's Sacred Banner[/] releases a fiery vortex that deals [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies caught within and greatly [db]slowing[/] them.

Casting Holy Conflagration[/] refreshes the duration of her active Fiery Rally[/] banner. However, it will not refresh the ability to grant a shield as it's still counted as a single duration.
